sqlMap.select:
SELECT ORDER_ID ,TRANS_MER_ID ,TRANS_TER_ID ,TRANS_AMT ,TRANS_CUR ,TRANS_TIME ,TRANS_STATUS ,TRANS_TYPE ,RES_CODE ,SETTLE_DATE ,PAN ,CREATE_TIME ,RESERVED ,EXT ,TRACKING_NO ,EXT1 ,EXT2 ,EXT3 ,CREATE_DATE ,CMSP_RESVERVED FROM CMSP_PAY_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND CMSP_PAY_INFO.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ORDER_ID) =#order_id#
(TRANS_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#trans_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TER_ID) Like '%'||(#trans_ter_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_AMT) =#trans_amt#
(TRANS_CUR) Like '%'||(#trans_cur:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TIME) Like '%'||(#trans_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_STATUS) Like '%'||(#trans_status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TYPE) Like '%'||(#trans_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RES_CODE) Like '%'||(#res_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETTLE_DATE) Like '%'||(#settle_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PAN) Like '%'||(#pan:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(EXT) Like '%'||(#ext:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRACKING_NO) Like '%'||(#tracking_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(EXT1) Like '%'||(#ext1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(EXT2) Like '%'||(#ext2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(EXT3) Like '%'||(#ext3:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_DATE) Like '%'||(#create_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CMSP_RESVERVED) Like '%'||(#cmsp_resverved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM CMSP_PAY_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND CMSP_PAY_INFO.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ORDER_ID) =#order_id#
(TRANS_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#trans_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TER_ID) Like '%'||(#trans_ter_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_AMT) =#trans_amt#
(TRANS_CUR) Like '%'||(#trans_cur:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TIME) Like '%'||(#trans_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_STATUS) Like '%'||(#trans_status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TYPE) Like '%'||(#trans_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RES_CODE) Like '%'||(#res_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETTLE_DATE) Like '%'||(#settle_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PAN) Like '%'||(#pan:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(EXT) Like '%'||(#ext:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRACKING_NO) Like '%'||(#tracking_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(EXT1) Like '%'||(#ext1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(EXT2) Like '%'||(#ext2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(EXT3) Like '%'||(#ext3:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_DATE) Like '%'||(#create_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CMSP_RESVERVED) Like '%'||(#cmsp_resverved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
